item.title: [PI]How Can i Make This Teleport Object Delete A Hat[PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“manny458, post:3, topic:463075”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=566375.msg4118707#msg4118707 date=1349425059]
Assuming your source is PI

			if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == #) {
			c.getItems().deleteEquipment(#, c.playerHat);

[/quote]
Ok it worked perfectly how can i make it delete all the ones that are the person inventury[/quote]
You can add a loop or just add for as many items as you need

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]How Can i Make This Teleport Object Delete A Hat[PI]
item.dc:creator: @manny458 manny458
item.description:
@manny458 wrote:

I want this code to delete the item the player is wearing when they teleport this is my code

case 2471: if ((c.objectX == 2835 && c.objectY == 3819) && c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 15422) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2835,3818 , 0); c.sendMessage("You Teleport To Santa."); } else { c.sendMessage("Kill The Queen And Wear The Hat To Continue"); } break;
